name: The Sealing Scroll
description:
Story

You are a detective at the end of the 19th century. You have devoted your life to studying the ancient mysteries of Sealing scrolls, magical parchments used to seal mythical beings humanity couldn't understand or comprehend. Now, you found one of there scrolls, and the being bound by it is haunting you. Will you help it escape, or keep it locked inside forever? The choice is yours.

Instructions

Draw symbols inside the circle using your notes (hidden in the bottom right). 

You can choose from 18 symbols and have 10 total attemps. 

You have to match the symbol enough for the scroll to accept it. 

Each symbol drawn gives or takes energy from the ritual. 

At the end of your 10 attemps, the ritual will succeed or fail.

What will you release into our world?
